elements: I have benefited from exercise. [Use this with two Lessons Learnt to gain more Health.]
I must devote my energies to this.
Am I ready to grow stronger?
Am I ready to grow stronger?
You might not know it to look at me, but I have grown strong as a smith or a soldier. [Use this with three Lessons Learnt to gain more Health.]
I must devote my energies to this.
Shall I grow stronger yet?[Use this with three Lessons Learnt  to gain more Health.]
There are many things now that I could crush in my fists. [Use this with four Lessons Learnt to gain more Health.]
I must devote my energies to this.
If I know the right Lore, I can employ the invisible arts to reach an even higher summit. I must choose between strength and grace.
Could I grow healthier still? [Use this with four Lessons Learnt to gain more Health.]
I move like a mountain and strike like the sky. 'To master others is strength. To master yourself is power.' [Health and Skill can increase no further.]
I must devote my energies to this.
Machine perfection. Sinew-bound ivory, tight in satin skin. 'From here, I can only deteriorate.' [Health and Skill can increase no further.]
I must devote my energies to this.
I am flush with clever quotations. [Use this with two Lessons Learnt to gain more Reason.]
Shall I stock my mind with more knowledge?
Shall I stock my mind with more knowledge?
I have learnt enough to know how little I know. [Use this with three Lessons Learnt to gain more Reason.]
My skull creaks at the corners with the knowledge I've accrued. [Use this with four Lessons Learnt to gain more Reason.]
If I know the right Lore, I can employ the invisible arts to reach an even higher summit. I must choose between illumination and concentration.
Can I sharpen my reason further?
Can I sharpen my reason further?
Can I sharpen my reason further?
Can I sharpen my reason further?
My mind is glass, and my memory light. [Reason and Skill can increase no further.]
This chilly stillness is the stillness of certainty. [Reason and Skill can increase no further.]
My daydreams sometimes outpace my dreams. [Use this with Work to Paint, or with Study and with two Lessons Learnt to gain more Passion.]
Am I ready to feed my passions further?
Am I ready to feed my passions further?
I can employ Passion to do the best work I can; or if I have a reputation, I can paint something to win attention.
I can employ Passion to do the best work I can; or if I have a reputation, I can paint something to win attention.
I have been known to break six pencils in a day. [Use this with Work to Paint, or with Study and three Lessons Learnt to gain more Passion.]
What could I see, what could I be? [Use this with three Lessons Learnt to gain more Passion.]
What could I see, what could I be?

Phantoms ride my waking mind. [Use this with four Lessons Learnt to gain more Passion.]
If I know the right Lore, I can employ the invisible arts to reach an even higher summit. I must choose between unreason and folly.
What furious visions remain? [Use this with Work to Paint, or with Study and four Lessons Learnt to gain more Passion.]
